\viewkind4\uc1\pard\lang1042\f0\fs20 1. General anesthesia
\par 2. Prone position
\par 3. Clean drapping with fluid collecting bag
\par 4. Small skin incision
\par 5. L PLIF 
\par 1) Lt. laminotomy for bilateral decompression 
\par : adhesion & inflmmmation, severe
\par 2) facetectomy/ discectomy
\par 3) Cage interbody insertion 
\par : transversely lying 
\par : autologous bone + allograft + DBM
\par 6. Percutaneous screw fixation (6.5mm X 45mm)
\par 7. Bleeding control, irrigation
\par 8. Hemovac 100cc
\par 9. Suture
\par }

{\rtf1\ansi\ansicpg949\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1042{\fonttbl{\f0\fnil\fcharset129 \'b1\'bc\'b8\'b2\'c3\'bc;}}
\viewkind4\uc1\pard\lang1042\f0\fs20 1. General anesthesia
\par 2. Prone position with slightly flexed neck

\par 4. Small skin incision
\par 5. Small laminotomy
\par 5. Discectomy ( C )
\par 1) ruptured disc (+)
\par 2) adhesion, severe
\par 5. Decompressive foraminotomy ( C )
\par 5. Decompressive laminotomy ( C )
\par (unilateral laminotomy with bilateral decompression)
\par 5. Decompressive hemilaminectomy with contralateal sublaminoplasty 
\par with total flacectomy ( C )
\par 1) adhesion, severe
\par 2) inflammation, severe
\par 6. Bleeding control, irrigation
\par 7. Hemovac 100cc
\par 8. Suture
\par }
